title: Atomic structure and correlations within the Periodic Table
creator_credit: David G. Anderson, Andrew Patterson, Jr and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The first episode of this film looks at atomic structure and the Periodic Table, and the second episoe looks at correlations with the Periodic Table. Using a blackboard size Periodic Table from which individual elements can be removed or placed at will, this film illustrates a method of using the Periodic system to determine the electronic structure of atoms. Suitable for Upper-Secondary students.
